success.message:
Successfully validated your Scratch account.
isOnline is now working.
You can close this tab.

verifyerror.message: An error occured. Please contact @isOnlineV2 if you come from isOnline account validation.

validateprofilelink.message: Validate this account to use isOnline on it

didnotvalidate.message: Whoops! Looks like you didn't validate your account on isOnline. isOnline won't work until you validate your account. It takes around 20 seconds.

unvalidatedacc.message: Whoops! isOnline isn't working on this Scratch account because it isn't validated. Want to use isOnline on this account too? Validate an additional user.

keywaschanged.message: Whoops! isOnline isn't working with this Scratch account because you used it on another computer. Synchronize your computers to avoid this error permanently or re-validate to temporarily fix it.

isbot.message: Whoops! It looks like you've been marked as a bot by the isOnline server. isOnline isn't working. Please contact isOnlineV2 to unblock your account.

absenthelp.message: The user has open inactive Scratch tabs.

unknownhelp.message: isOnline did not detect activity in the last week. This user may not use isOnline anymore.

noiohelp.message: This user has to install isOnline in order to show their status.

ownstatushelp.message: Set your status manually, or leave it on automatic.

help.message: Need help or have questions? Comment on

friendsnote.message: Note: You can disable notifications temporarily while keeping friends by setting your status to "Do Not Disturb" on your profile.

notifyawayonline.message: Notify if an Away friend goes Online

friendlistdescription.message: Know the statuses of a maximum of 10 friends with just a click and receive instant desktop notifications when they get on!

nofriendshelp.message: You can add people that follow you to your friend list by clicking "+ friends" on their profiles!

friendserror.message: Error: re-validate to solve the problem.

dndhelp1.message: You won't receive any online friends notifications

dndhelp2.message: and people will see you as offline on their friend list.

onlyfollowing.message: You can only add users that are following you to your friend list.

dndotherhelp.message: This user isn't receiving online friends notifications.

friendsnotcompatible.message: isOnline friends only works in Chrome 17+ & Firefox 55+

notifyofflineonline.message: Send a notification when a friend goes Online

removeiolinks.message: Whoops! You have iO links or iO ads in your profile. This is not allowed. Please remove. (Crown is not available now.)
